Name: Coptic textile
Description: Fragment of textile made in tapestry, with curved seams following the shape of some motifs. The decoration is arranged on the borders on the basis of bands, which accomodate highly schematic floral and vegetal motifs in various colours. All this is completed with some stripes in black on both ends and with rows of heart-shaped motifs in red. The central band, which is wider, has no decoration.
